hints.content: To subtract on the number line, we start at $74$ and move **left** $\purpleD{50}$ and then $\maroonD{9}$ more.

This number line shows $74 - 59$:

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 24, and 74. From 74 an arrow goes to 24 with the label minus 50 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 24 to question mark with the label minus 9 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8fc6d6f6a0b767e5ea6a5e142174c4293fd2c982)
